title: Social Community Manager
content:
Overview
The Social Media Community Manager is responsible for managing and engaging with our social media channels to build a strong community.
This role requires a strategic and creative thinker who can develop and implement social media strategies to increase brand awareness and engagement.
Accountabilities

Monitor social media conversations and engage with our audience to foster a sense of community.
Respond to comments, messages, and inquiries from followers in a timely and professional manner.
Being 100% compliant to marketing regulations.
Posting social media content on requiredplatforms.
Analyze social media metrics and provide reports on performance and engagement.
Collaborate with other teams (marketing, design, customer service, etc.) to ensure social media initiatives are aligned with overall business goals.
Stay up-to-date with social media trends and best practices, and provide recommendations for improvements.

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or a related field.
Proven experience as a Social Media Community Manager or similar role.
Native in Japanese, fluent or minimum conversational in English both speaking and reading.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Strong knowledge of social media platforms, preliminary Instagram, Twitter, LINE, and Youtube. Better to have other platforms in Japan and Korea.
Creative thinker with the ability to develop engaging community building.
Ability to multitask and manage multiple social media channels simultaneously.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to track and report on social media metrics.
Ability to leverage social media management tools (Sprinklr) in order for posting management and analytics.
